name: Student
requirements: Guess 10 flags correctly in a row or achieve a score of 120.

name: Geography Buff
description: Starting to know your countries well.
requirements: Guess 20 flags correctly in a row or achieve a score of 250.

name: Professor
requirements: Guess 30 flags correctly in a row or achieve a score of 400.

name: Explorer
description: You’ve traveled the globe in your mind.
requirements: Guess 50 flags correctly in a row or achieve a score of 600.

name: Cartographer
requirements: Guess 70 flags correctly in a row or achieve a score of 850.

name: World Traveler
requirements: Guess 100 flags correctly in a row or achieve a score of 1200.

name: Ambassador
requirements: Guess 150 flags correctly in a row or achieve a score of 1800.

name: Diplomat
requirements: Guess 200 flags correctly in a row or achieve a score of 2500.

name: Historian
requirements: Guess 300 flags correctly in a row or achieve a score of 3500.

name: World Master
requirements: Guess all flags correctly without mistakes or achieve a score of 5000.
